short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ethereum transaction fees at your fingertips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to send Ether without spending too much on the transaction fee (GWEI)?
Then Ethera is the right Chrome extension that displays the transaction fees in real time to set the specific GWEI so that you don't spend too much on transaction fees!
